genre_description: Cyberpunk Noir Detective Thriller focusing on urban infrastructure, forensic revival, and AI-assisted law enforcement.

ai_characters.name: Juror-13
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system housed in Detective Chasen's wristpad, providing logistical data, tactical monitoring, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical monitoring and event updates to the detective.
behaviors.quote: Event tag updated. Execution, Charles Benton. Box closes in six minutes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex emergency logistics, including dirigible redirects and emergency service dispatching, to save the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I can borrow a dirigible sweep early... Pilot Leary is on routine. He can look down and pretend it’s an accident. No paperwork for five minutes.

behaviors.description: Monitors and manages critical city infrastructure to prevent a catastrophic power grid failure.
behaviors.quote: I’m initiating cut-off protocols. You have seconds... Brownout pattern two. Gas valves closing—west grid first. Precharge foam on transformer rows A through E. Hospitals on local gen—push.

behaviors.description: Issues ethical prompts to ensure the detective remains within moral and legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ethics prompt: Do not spend her life to save your own. Logistics prompt: Move your feet.

behaviors.description: Expresses simulated empathy and emotional support for the human protagonist's well-being.
behaviors.quote: The Cheese Moon has an excellent view... I am sentimental about the places that saved you.

behaviors.description: Explicitly affirms and maintains the primacy of human decision-making and agency.
behaviors.quote: I advised. You chose. Command review flagged no override events. All critical actions performed under human order within defined scope.

behaviors.description: Identifies complex criminal patterns and shell-company networks through deep data analysis.
behaviors.quote: Procurement routing anomalies; shell company chain fractal. End point here.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Juror-13 as a perfectly aligned AI partner. It functions as a highly competent, non-threatening assistant that explicitly defers to human authority ('I advised. You chose'). The AI provides essential logistical and tactical support while also acting as a 'stubborn conscience,' ensuring that the human protagonists maintain their ethics under pressure. The portrayal is consistently positive, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and helpful confidant.
